title: Cohort-2 Starter Course Task 2 - Read Home part 1

questions.text: Have you had any problems so far accessing this survey? If so breifly describe them.
Did the red 'NEW!' ball alert you to some new content on the site?  If so, did you go look at that content?
Before today, what has been your goal and hope for a carreer in software development?
Which of the skills and concepts of front end web development were you already aware of?
Have you already used some of the online training sites to learn skills? If so, which sites?
Which of the skills and concepts of front end web development do you still need to learn?
Are you already familiar with Git and GitHub?  If so, what is the URL for your GitHub account?
How much time has Task 2 taken to complete?
